name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior MLOps Engineer with 8 years of experience in deploying robust MLOps solutions across diverse industries including healthcare and finance. Proficient in **MLOps** frameworks and tools such as **MLflow**, **DVC**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and cloud services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for streamlined model deployment and monitoring. Expertise in modern programming languages like **Python**, utilizing libraries such as **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **HuggingFace** for building and optimizing machine learning models. Skilled in implementing CI/CD processes with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for efficient development workflows. 

Strong background in machine learning methodologies, including **decision trees**, **clustering**, and **regression** techniques, as well as experience with large language models like **GPT** and **BERT** along with generative models like **StableDiffusion**. I have successfully led projects that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My collaborative spirit and excellent communication skills enable me to work effectively in team environments, driving projects to exceed compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
